activities.title: Our Activities
activities.TrekkingDesc: Trekking on Mailhos Hill, located 90 kilometers from the city of Mendoza, in Valle del Sol, Las Vegas. It has an 8-kilometer round trip route, lasting approximately 3 hours and reaching an altitude of almost 3,000 meters above sea level. Medium-low difficulty, no technical challenges, and spectacular views.
activities.Trekking y RaftingDesc: 12-kilometer rafting with a duration of approximately 1 hour along the Mendoza River. An exciting route perfect for families and groups of friends.
activities.Trekking y RappelDesc: Trekking and rappelling at Garganta del Diablo, located 80 kilometers from the city of Mendoza, in El Salto, Potrerillos. A 2-hour route with medium-low difficulty at 1,700 meters above sea level.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Instinto NÃ³made, our mission is to provide unforgettable and enriching travel experiences that connect people with new cultures, places, and adventures. We strive to offer personalized and high-quality service, always respecting the environment and local communities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We aspire to be leaders in the tourism industry, recognized for our innovation, sustainability, and excellence in customer service. We seek to inspire people to explore the world, foster intercultural understanding, and contribute positively to the communities we visit.
